name: Wobblodds
description:
Wobblodds is a third person platform fighting game where you face off against an opponent using a random set of special moves and attributes each fight. Combine attacks and special moves to knock your opponent off a constantly shrinking battlefield, set in a peculiar universe of floating islands. Adapt to your circumstances and embrace the chaos that follows!

We set out to create a party game featuring our favorite mechanics from platform fighting games, aiming to make the end result more casual and approachable by reducing the steep learning curve and adding some party game chaos!
